--------------------
<Text: Turpentine (song):  The song was one of the band's first compositions and remained unreleased for seven years before being released on the band's second EP, "The First Session" on August 26, 1997.>
Triplets:<Turpentine
3:
--------------------
Text: Turpentine (song):  Although not as well known as Hole's later songs, "Turpentine" is a notable song for the band as it is often cited as "the first Hole song."
Triplets:<Turpentine
